titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office building located at 24 Corliss Street, Providence, Rhode Island, as the "Harry Kizirian Post Office Building".

An Act to designate the United States Post Office building located at 24 Corliss Street Providence, Rhode Island, as the "Harry Kizirian Post Office Building", to amend chapter 2 of title 39, United States Code, to adjust the salary of the Board of Governors of the United States Postal Service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure.
Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

action.text: Mr. McHugh moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.
Measure laid before Senate.
Amendment SP 2947 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Stevens.
Amendment SP 2947 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. McHugh asked unanimous consent that the House disagree to the Senate amendments.
House disagreed to the Senate amendments Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Message on House action received in Senate and at the desk:.
Senate receded from its amendments by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/5/1996--House disagreed to Senate amendment. Designates the United States Post Office building located at 24 Corliss Street, Providence, Rhode Island, as the Harry Kizirian Post Office Building.
